sqlMap.select: select A.KPSQ_DJXH kpsqDjxh, (select AA.kpsqfs_mc from dm_kpsqfs AA where AA.kpsqfs_dm = A.KPSQFS_DM) kpsqfs, A.KH_DJXH khDjxh, (SELECT KH.KHMC FROM QY_KH_DJXX KH WHERE KH.KH_DJXH = A.KH_DJXH) khmc, A.SQ_KPJE_HJ sqKpjeHj, A.SQ_KPRQ sqKprq, A.FPKJJE fpkjje, (A.sq_kpje_hj - A.Fpkjje) wkjje, (SELECT MC FROM QY_RYDJ DM WHERE DM.CZY_DJXH = A.DJR_CZY_DJXH) sqrMc, A.KPDW_JGMC dwMc, (SELECT JC FROM QY_ZZJG JG WHERE JG.JGBM = A.DJ_JGBM) bmMc, A.djrq djrq, A.bzsm bzsm, A.dj_jgbm djJgbm, A.ss_jgbm ssJgbm, A.spbz spbz from js_kpsq A WHERE A.YXBZ = 'Y' AND A.FPKJBZ = 'N' AND (A.SPBZ = 'N' OR (A.SPBZ = 'Y' AND A.WSSPZT_DM = '3')) and A.kpsq_djxh = #kpsqDjxh#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE JS_KPSQ set bzsm = #bzsm#, spbz = #spbz# where kpsq_djxh = #kpsqDjxh#
